availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel P. Simpson (Butler County, Kentucky, physician and assistant surgeon)

body.p: Butler County, Kentucky, physician and assistant surgeon. South Carolina native. Son of Martha Simpson. Married to Martha P. Simpson. Physician in Butler County in 1860. Served as assistant surgeon of the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 9, 1861 to January 29, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, Woodbury, p. 1001.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 824.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 250.
